latestPosts.title: Effortless Typography, Even in Dark Mode
latestPosts.description: Today we're announcing the next version of the Tailwind CSS Typography plugin, which brings easy dark mode support and a brand new customization API.

latestPosts.title: Standalone CLI: Use Tailwind CSS without Node.js
latestPosts.description: Today we're announcing a new standalone CLI build that gives you the full power of Tailwind CLI in a self-contained executable — no Node.js or npm required.

latestPosts.title: Tailwind CSS v3.0
latestPosts.description: Tailwind CSS v3.0 is here — bringing incredible performance gains, huge workflow improvements, and a seriously ridiculous number of new features.
